import React from 'react' import { CART } from '../../utils/constants/routes' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import "../../templates/css/CartCard.css" //toFixec() function CartCard({product}) { return (

{product.name}

{product.manufacturer}

Price: ${product.price.toFixed(2)}

{product.bulk_discount && ( ยก{product.bulk_discount.discount_percent}% DISCOUNT! )}
) } export default CartCard
